name: maptorium-ui
description: Maptorium UI - Frontend core for Maptorium project

scripts.release: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle && cp dist/maptorium.js ../maptorium-leaflet/maptorium-ui/maptorium.js && cp dist/maptorium.js ../maptorium-cesium/maptorium-ui/maptorium.js

author: Oleg Gunyakov
